divs: sighting detailsi was in my garden at my home address, i had only recently returned from the pub where i watched the england vs germany world cup game. i came home early because england lost. so, i was in my garden having a cigarette. i had been outside for a couple of minuets and i was walking back up some steps which lead to my front door, and as i walked up the steps i noticed the ufo in the sky. it was a triangle formation of circles, which stayed the exact same distance apart from each other as they moved across the sky. the circles where burning intensely, like three suns. the best way i could describe their colour would be to say they where 'fiery' - again, like a sun. they flew across the sky at considerable speed. my instant reaction was that it was a ufo of some kind, i instantly ruled out the possibility of it an aeroplane. i considered that it might be comets, but it seemed unlikely to me. i watched them for maybe ten seconds before i took my phone out of my pocket and started filming them. (my phone is a nokia 5800 xpress music, with a carl zeiss, tessar 2.8\3.7, 3.2 megapixel \af camera) i followed their movements and also zoomed in (which is what the clicking sound is on the video). they flew from my left to my right, and as they flew to the right i could tell they was also flying further away, into the distance. as they got further away, the furthest right of the three circles started to dim and then disappear from sight, the middle and left circle followed suit as they got further away. if there is any other information that you think is necessary or relevant, i would be happy to provide you with it.
Summary: UFO triangle formation flew across sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Romford
There were no other sightings in Romford on or around June 18th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
